name: Starhopper (Adam Harris)
description:
Starhopper is a simple game based around the concept of piloting a spaceship (using W,A,S,D) to pickup collectables around the screen.

Yellow pickups increase your score by one

Green pickups give you another 5 seconds

Try to beat your highscore :)

and thank you for playing, this is my first Unity project for a couple years so getting used to it again.
